active.name: Trinket
active.effects: Consume a charge to place a visible {{tip|Effigy}} at the target location, which grants {{tip|sight}} over the surrounding area for {{pp|130 + (300-130)/17*(x-1) for 20}} seconds. For enemies, it visually appears identical to {{ci|Fiddlesticks}} (including on the minimap) and has no visible [[health bar]] until it ''activates''. Enemy {{tip|champion|champions}} that approach it will activate it, causing it to automatically sound a Danger [[ping]] to its allies as well as fake a random action for up to 2 seconds. If not destroyed by that time, it will deal 1 damage to itself.
